quoridor
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  quoridor.Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

Create different type of games such as Human-Human, Computer-Computer, Human-Computer and no display game for testing

Field Summary
private  Board boardState
          Current board state
private  AIPlayer[] Computer
          To initialise the AI depending on depth given

          Round of game

Method Summary
protected  void chooseAI(int playerNumber)
          Choose difficulty of AI by depth level Dumb is 1 or Smart is 2
protected  void choosePlayers()
          Choosing of players Choose either Human or Computer for Black/White Player If Computer is chosen, difficulty has to be chosen.
